name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
dialogue: Insaan ko dibbe mein sirf tab hona chahiye, jab wo mar chuka ho.

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
dialogue: Seize the day my friend, pehle is din ko poori tarah jiyo, phir chalis ke bare mein sochna.

name: Tu Jhooti Main Makkar
dialogue: Aaj kal relationship mein ghusna aasaan hai, usme se nikalna mushkil. Rishta jodna aasaan hai, todna mushkil.

name: Tu Jhooti Main Makkar
dialogue: Raatein jo bachhi hai woh sari teri. Mujhe toh tere din chahiye, teri subah, teri dopahar, teri sham.

name: Chup Chup Ke
dialogue: Toh ise ghar kyun bolte hain, jila kyun nahi ghoshit kr dete.

name: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
dialogue: Main udna chahta hun, daudna chahta hun, girna bhi chahta hun. Bas, rukna nahi chahta.

name: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
dialogue: Mujhe tumse pyaar ho jaaega, phir se. Aur tumhe nahi hoga, phir se.

name: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
dialogue: Kuch logon ke saath rehne se hi sab theek ho jaata hai.

name: Laapataa Ladies
dialogue: Ek baar ghunghat le liya, toh aage nahin, neeche dekh kar chalna seekho.

name: Laapataa Ladies
dialogue: Agar tu nahin hoti na, toh humko hum nahin milte.

name: Wake Up Sid
dialogue: Goals paane ki khushi tabhi mehsoos hoti hai, jab usse kisi ke saath share kar sako.

name: Wake Up Sid
dialogue: Iss sheher mein jahan har waqt sab kuch badalta rehta hai, bas ek samundar hi jo nahi badalta. Humesha yahin rehta hai.

name: Dil Chahta Hai
dialogue: Mujhe yakeen hai ki main sirf isliye janma hun ki tumse pyaar kar sakun, tum sirf isliye ki ek din meri ban jao.

name: Dil Chahta Hai
dialogue: Yeh sach hai ki main aapse pyaar karta hoon and I am not sorry for that.
